#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int rev(int n)
{
    int nw=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        nw = 10*nw+n%10;
        n=n/10;
    }
    return nw;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int num;
        scanf("%d",&num);
        int i=0;
        while(rev(num)!=num)
        {
            num=num+rev(num);
            i++;
        }
        printf("%d %d\n",i,num);
    }
    return 0;
}
